snippet.title: Bloom - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Bloom is available now for Playdate! https://rngpartygames.itch.io/bloom

Bloom is a real-time narrative-driven social sim about starting up a flower shop made exclusively for Playdate. Tend to Midori's garden while texting friends and family as she starts a new chapter of her life. The game takes place over many real-life days.

Soundtrack available here: https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/pichuscute/bloom-official-soundtrack
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RNGParty
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rngparty
